casebody.data:
Second Department,

September, 1948.

(September 23, 1948.) Abraham Less, Respondent, v. 11 West 42nd Street, Inc., Appellant.

Motion for leave to appeal to the Appellate Division granted. Motion for stay granted on condition that appellant perfect the appeal for Monday, October 18th (for which day the case is set down) and be ready for argument when reached; otherwise, motion denied. Present — Carswell, Acting P. J., Johnston, Adel, Nolan and Sneed, JJ.
